encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Let's see if you can break past the rock-hard willpower of my POKéMON!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Show me your best!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I took you for granted, and so I lost.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Let's see how far you can go.\pGood luck.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Only those TRAINERS who have a policy about POKéMON can turn pro.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Can you handle my all-out offensive of WATER-type POKéMON?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: There's plenty strong of TRAINERS still ahead of you.\pStay strong!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: You won't live long in combat!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Not with your puny power!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I tell you, kid, my electric POKéMON and me trust each other to the end!\pTrust your POKéMON, and they'll always have your back!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I must have dozed off. Welcome!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I hope you're prepared.\nI do not plan on losing!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I concede defeat.\nYou are remarkably strong.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I must say I'm impressed!\pBest of luck to you in your future battles!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Fwahahaha!\pA mere child like you dares to challenge me?
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Despair to the creeping horror of POISON-type POKéMON!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You have proven your worth!\pLet's just see how long you can last…

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I had a vision of your arrival.\pI dislike battling, but if you wish…
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I will show you my powers!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: A loss is a loss.\pTread carefully, I see difficult battles in your future.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: My fiery POKéMON are all rough and ready with intense heat!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: You better have a BURN HEAL!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I have burned down to nothing!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Not even ashes remain!\pI like your style, kid!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Fwahahaha!\pI shall bring glory TEAM ROCKET!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I'm not holding back!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: That was a truly intense fight.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You have won.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Your POKéMON will be at my mercy when they are frozen solid.\pHahaha!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Are you ready?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You're better than I though.\pGo on ahead.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Through rigorous training, people and POKéMON can become stronger without limit.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: My POKéMON will grind you down with our superior power!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: My job is done.\pGo face your next challenge.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: POKéMON are for battling!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I'll show you how a real TRAINER battles!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I have nothing else to say.\pRun along now, child!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Are you ready to lose?
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Your Adventure ends with me, {PLAYER}!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I hate to admit it, but you have bested me.\pI shall eagerly watch your path forward.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I am usually a man of research.\pBut at this moment in time…
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I shall battle, with no mercy!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You were truely astounding, battling alongside your POKéMON.\pI wish you the best of luck moving forward!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: People say you can clip Flying-type POKéMON's wings with a jolt of electricity…\pI won't allow such insults to bird POKéMON!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I'll show you the real power of the magnificent bird POKéMON!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: A defeat is a defeat.\pI hope you go far, {PLAYER}.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: My research is going to make me the authority on BUG-type POKéMON!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Let me demonstrate what I've learned!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You're an expert on POKéMON!\pI hope you're next battles are just as fun!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: POKéMON are super cute!\pYou want to battle?
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I'm warning you--I'm good!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You shouldn't be so serious!\pYou're mean!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I will become a truly powerful TRAINER, in order to make the Rainbow-hued POKéMON appear!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: You're going to help me reach that level!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I didn't think our potentials would be so different.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You seem to have something more than I have…\pSo be it.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: You spoiled my training!\pCome on.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: We shall do battle!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: All right.\nYou're worthy!\pCarry that strength forward!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Do you know about the Steel type?\pThey are very hard, cold, sharp, and really strong!
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Um… I’m not lying.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: You are a better TRAINER than me.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You show both skill and kindness.\pI wish you the best of luck with your journey.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I, {STR_VAR_1}--the Winter Trainer--
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: shall demonstrate my power!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I am impressed by your prowess.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: With your strong will, I know you will overcome all life’s obstacles.\pKeep your head high as you move forward.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I am the world's best Dragon-type master.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I will use my full power against any opponent!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I might have lost, but you're still not as strong as me.\pYou'd be wise to remember that, going forward.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: I have trained all around the world, making my Psychic-type POKéMON powerful.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Losing is not an option!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Even though I was defeated, I won't change my course.\pI advise you to remain cautious for your upcoming fights.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Fwahahaha!\pA mere child like you dares to challenge me?
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Despair to the creeping horror of POISON-type POKéMON!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You have proven your worth!\pLet's just see how long you can last…

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Through rigorous training, people and POKéMON can become stronger without limit.
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: My POKéMON will grind you down with our superior power!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: My job is done.\pGo face your next challenge.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: You're {PLAYER}? How amusing.\pI love Dark-type POKéMON.\pThink you can take them?
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Just try to entertain me.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Well, aren't you good.\nI like that in a TRAINER.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Strong POKéMON.\pWeak POKéMON.\pThat is only the selfish perception of people.\pYou understand there's more to POKéMON than that.\pDon't lose your way as you climb to the top.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_OPENNING: {STR_VAR_1}: Are you ready to lose?
encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Your Adventure ends with me, {PLAYER}!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I hate to admit it, but you have bested me.\pI shall eagerly watch your path forward.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I'll try to be gentle!
You look like a kid trying to meddle in stuff.\pNot on my watch!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You best keep out of the way!\pI won't hold back next time.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: We've got no room for snot nosed kids in Team Aqua!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You better not get in our way again, kid!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: The world needs more land!\pThere's no other way around that!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You'll change you're mind one day and then regret getting in our way!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I've got no time for dumb looking kids getting in our way!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: If you weren't dumb, you wouldn't be getting in our way!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I hatched and rasied all of my POKéMON!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I guess I need to work in my breeding technique…
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: My breeding technique still needs work I guess…

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Did you really raise all your POKéMON yourself?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Someone else must've raised your POKéMON for you.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Why are you looking at me like that?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: It's rude to stare!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Eww… did you just look at me?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Can you just not…

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: My mind and my POKéMON are in sync!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: You and your POKéMON were more in sync, it seems.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: How did you train your POKéMON I wonder?\pLet me read you mind to find out!\p… … …\pThat makes no sense…\nYou're crazy.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Look at me go!\nI can destroy the world!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: It's not fun when you pretend too.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You're a party pooper!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I want to play a game!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Can we play another game?

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Ah!\pYou look like a strong trainer!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Honestly…\nI was expecting more from you…
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Yes you are strong.\pNot at strong as I was in my prime.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: SLOW DOWN!\pIT'S RUDE TO RUN!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: IT'S RUDE TO STARE!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: It's all about the quality of your training!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Huh, I guess I need to train some more.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Back to training for me, I guess.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Move out of the way!\pWhat are you doing!?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Now that was just plain rude.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Watch where you're going next time.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I can't wait to use my technique from school!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: What! That technique was much better than mine!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Why don't they teach us useful techniques in school.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I lost my last battle so I'm gonna get payback on you!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Err, you were suppose to lose!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Amature.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: That's a neat BAG you've got there!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Still not as good as my BAG, though.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You're BAG may be cool, but it's not even close to mine.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: My bird POKéMON are the strongest in the world!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: They're still the strongest in my world.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Bird POKéMON are super cool, don't you think?!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: What do my little eyes spy?\pIs that… a POKéMON battle?!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: My little eyes did not spy this.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I'll be honest… I'm not entirely sure how I spy works.\pDid I do it right?

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I can knock down trees just by punching them!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You made me drop all the logs I picked up.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Fufufu!\pI always look forward to POKéMON battles.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Maybe we can battle again sometime?\pFufufu.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Stop right there!\pYou were about to step on a precious sample!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: My bad, I thought that was a precious sample.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Ha!\pI'm on a streak and I'm not planning on ending it here!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Well, I didn't plan on ending it here…
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Time to build it up from scratch again, I guess.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I bought me the most powerful POKéMON imaginable!\pYou don't stand a chance!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I spent so much on these useless POKéMON too.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: Me and my precious Bug POKéMON are on our way to fight a GYM!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: I guess we're not quite ready yet.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I love Bug POKéMON with all my heart!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: You look very capable!\pWould you mind entertaining my POKéMON in a battle?
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: You have done a remarkable job raising up your POKéMON!

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: I was just on my way home after a great haul!\pI guess I can battle you too!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_TAUNT: Well that was a bit of shame.
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: I should've just taken my haul and gone home.

encounter_text.PRE_BATTLE_TAUNT: You better not wipe my run!
encounter_text.POST_BATTLE_CLOSER: Why?\pI've been grinding this out for like 6 months…
